title: Ratt
content:
who is a fan of this heavy metal group, i'm not a real fan yet
the only song i've heard is shame,shame.shame, there's a video clip to it on [url=http://music.yahoo.com/]yahoo! launch[/url][url=http://www.dosvault.tk][img]http://venus.walagata.com/w/thedosvault/sig/tdv_banner.jpg[/img][/url]
